item.title: Chestnut Cake
item.description: How simple can it be? This recipe can be simplified to literally be “mix all together; bake”. About the Chestnut paste This is not easy to come by outside of Switzerland but it is a 74% boiled chestnuts 26% sugar mix, so I think this should be fairly easy to make at home (but I haven’t tried). This is how the ingredient I use looks like:
